Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement audio chunking for long TTS playback

Instead of truncating audio to 2 seconds, now splits long audio into
multiple 2-second chunks and plays them sequentially. This preserves
full speech for longer text.

- generate_speech\(\) returns list of chunk paths
- speak\(\) plays all chunks with wait=True between each
- Added fade in/out on chunks to prevent clicks
- Updated PLAN.md with audio system documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
